Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Of these , clarithromycin was implicated in 23 ( 27 . 6 % ) cases , ciprofloxacin in 12 ( 14 . 4 % ) cases , and ofloxacin in 10 ( 12 % ) cases .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| clarithromycin-associated cases |
| ciprofloxacin-associated cases |
| ofloxacin-associated cases |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions three antibiotics - clarithromycin, ciprofloxacin, and ofloxacin. It also mentions the number of cases associated with each antibiotic. To identify the disease entities, we need to keep the words in the same order as in the paragraph and make them precise. So, the entities are "clarithromycin-associated cases," "ciprofloxacin-associated cases," and "ofloxacin-associated cases."

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| clarithromycin-associated cases |
| ciprofloxacin-associated cases |
| ofloxacin-associated cases |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions the number of cases associated with each antibiotic. The entities are "clarithromycin-associated cases," "ciprofloxacin-associated cases," and "ofloxacin-associated cases." These entities clearly refer to diseases or conditions associated with the use of these antibiotics. Therefore, they are valid disease entities. There are no other entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to diseases.
